CustomField.description: Only applicable for CC fellows in the China program that are in Stage = Engagement Confirmed. Checkbox auto-checks when the user selects DONE for the China Fellow Agreement tile on the Deliverable Tracker
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically updates when the fellow updates the Done/Not Done slider on the "China Fellow Agreement" tile on the Deliverables Tracker page in the fellow portal
CustomField.label: China Fellow Agreement
